name: Federico Navarrete
headline:
Technovator 💡, Author ✍️ and Orator 🎤,
Leading Digital Transformations 🛰️
headlineIntro: It’s time to bring innovation TO YOUR LIFE! Are you ready?
aboutDesc:
Welcome my fellow, nice to e-meet you. I’m Federico, and I’m passionate about shaping a better world 🌍 via technovations, always chasing the next big thing. Hopefully, we can together work on them soon.

I’ve lived in five countries, El Salvador, the USA, Poland, Spain, and Luxembourg, where I’ve collaborated with citizens of 30+ different nationalities, including my adventure at the European Commission. All this allowed me to build, Cultural Intelligence.

My unique journey has empowered me to lead fantastic teams, co-create innovative apps, publish pioneering Salvadoran folkloric books, automate multiple solutions, and develop impressive public speaking skills.

What about you? Are you ready for your next challenge?
LET’S CONNECT 💡
